fields_of_interest: Culture and media, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Business and Industry, Youth, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives: Horizon 2020 - program EU za raziskave in inovacvije (za promet!!!!!!!!!!!!
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
-Izboljšenje varnosti v cestnem prometu 
-Pomoč pri razvoju avtonomnih vozil.  
-Pohitritev integracije avtonomnih vozil na EU ceste in globalno 
-Evalvacija voznikov (agresivnost, varnost, način vožnje) 
-Trening voznikov (sodelovanje z centri varne vožnje)   
 
Cilji so v skladu z direktivami EU komisije.
